Grand Theft Auto V - это пятая часть в серии игр Grand Theft Auto, которая была выпущена в 2013 году. Она стала одной из самых продаваемых игр всех времен, собрав более 150 миллионов долларов за первые дни продаж.
Игра представляет собой открытый мир с огромным количеством возможностей. Игроки могут свободно перемещаться по городу, выполнять задания, грабить, покупать и продавать автомобили, а также участвовать в различных мероприятиях, таких как гонки, драки и многое другое.

Overwatch was one of my favourites on release of the original game, It was similar to TF2 in alot of ways, improved in some and worse in others but overall it just kinda worked.
Overtime they started to do worse and worse, classic Blizzard stuff of just not caring about the game.

Then they added a 2 to the end and made some aweful decisions, I've logged back in here and there but it honestly just makes me sad going back because it is not like it  used to be. 

I would recommend checking out either BattleBits or Deep Rock Galactic instead of playing into this dumpster fire.

I started playing overwatch in 2018 just when anniversary event arrived and I really liked overwatch back then. Uprising, retribution, summer and winter events, Junkersteins revenge. I was so happy to play this game that I even took a break from tf2 (To be honest, I took a lot of breaks from tf2, I've been playing since 2015 but only have 3k hours or smth like that). And when storm rising was announced, I was so excited. And to be honest, I do like overwatch 2, I don't care about battlepasses, pay to play story missions, buy skins because I don't care about cosmetics bs. But I can't deny the fact that blizzard just ran out of ideas and couldn't support their game anymore. That con of overwatch 2 was a desperate attempt to make players excited about their game. But after Jeff Kaplan quit blizzard, it was obvious that it won't be a game we've seen on blizzcon, it will be gutted like a cornish game hen. If you only care about gameplay, then sure, give it a try, but if you are looking for a game that can provide you far more joy, then I suggest you to install tf2.

Wish I could still love it but the balance team is the one thing that really makes that impossible. I could tolerate a lot of other things like the horrendous monetization and the sidelining of the actual game just to waste years making a crappy PVE that would get cancelled anyway. But the PVP hasn't gotten the changes it's needed for YEARS now so there really isn't much of a reason to play it until a bunch of idiots get fired.

猫

从前，我养了一只猫，我有十块钱，会用八块钱给它买吃的，经常给它洗澡，它也很粘我。

后来，我带它出去玩，路人觉得它很可爱，他们给它喂猫粮，火腿肠，我很不开心，因为它是我的。我想把它抱回家，可是它挣脱我，冲着给它好吃的人喵喵，我抱了几次他都不跟我走，还挠伤了我，于是我转身就走了.....

后来，偶然在路上遇到了它，它身上脏兮兮的。路人们只会给它好吃的，陪它玩玩，却不会带它回家，给它洗澡。它看到我后就跟着我回家，我把它关在了门外，它在门外喵喵地叫着，叫的我很难受，
可是我不会再要它了
。

cat

Once upon a time, I had a cat, I had ten dollars, I would buy it food for eight dollars, bathe it often, and it was very sticky to me.

Later, I took it out to play, passers-by thought it was cute, they fed it cat food, ham sausage, I was very unhappy because it was mine. I wanted to carry it home, but he broke away from me and meowed at the person who gave it good food, I hugged him a few times and he didn't go with me, and scratched me, so I turned around and left.....

Later, I came across it by chance on the road, and it was dirty. Passers-by will only give it good food and play with it, but they will not take it home and bathe it. It saw me and followed me home, I shut it out, it meowed outside the door, it was very uncomfortable,
but I wouldn't want it anymore
.

the gameplay is great, the game runs incredibly well, every hero has something different going for them, and playing it is like managing a game of mental chess when you really know what to do.

but the company doesn't respect your time or money, and probably never will. if i was a new player, having to unlock the new heroes would be too much of a deal-breaker and i probably wouldn't play to be honest, especially when i can play competitive without having all of the heroes.

steam reviews aren't about the company, and besides, you can fully enjoy this game and not care about skins or wasting money. only downside is that you'll have to grind for new heroes.
i hope a studio besides Blizzard picks up on the concept of a MOBA-style shooter like this one.

Hello! And welcome to the Los Pollos Hermanos family. My name is Gustavo, but you can call me "Gus". I am thrilled that you'll be joining our team. Each and every day, we serve our customers exceptional food, with impecable service. We take pride in everything that we do. And after this 10 week online seminar, I'm sure you'll fit right in. I like to think I see things in people. To begin, I'd like to talk about the cornerstone of the Los Pollos Hermanos brand. Communication. As an employee of Los Pollos Hermanos, you set the tone for the entire dining experience. Be mindful of what your words, and behavior communicate to our guests. Always be aware of your posture, remember to stand up straight. Your customers and your back will thank you for it. Put effort into your appearance, all employees are required to dress appropriately. Keep your uniform clean, and pressed. If you want respect, you must look respectable. Speak in complete sentences, we never use one word greetings like "Hey" or "Yeah?" Always make eye contact, and finally, whenever you're with a customer or not, remain composed. Inside, you can be thinking about your homework, or friends, or your side business, but no one should ever know it. Because at Los Pollos Hermanos, someone... Is always watching. So dont forget to smile! Thats all for today, see you next time when we'll be discussing cleanliness.
